reviews.review: Great professor! Explains complex mathematical concepts clearly and is always willing to help during office hours. Highly recommended for anyone struggling with calculus.
reviews.subject: Math

reviews.review: Dr. Smith's lectures are engaging and thought-provoking. He brings historical context to literature, making classics feel relevant to modern times. Assignments can be challenging but rewarding.
reviews.subject: English Literature

reviews.review: Tough but fair. Professor Johnson's organic chemistry class is not for the faint of heart, but if you put in the work, you'll learn a ton. His exam questions really make you think.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Brilliant researcher, but not the best teacher. Lectures can be confusing and she often seems unprepared. However, her insights during lab sessions are invaluable.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Amazing professor! Makes economics interesting with real-world examples and interactive class discussions. Her passion for the subject is contagious.
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: Dr. Patel is knowledgeable but his teaching style is very dry. Expect lots of memorization and little practical application. Exams are straightforward if you study the slides.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Inspiring art history classes! Professor Wilson's enthusiasm brings ancient artworks to life. Field trips to museums were a highlight. Grading can be subjective though.
reviews.subject: Art History

reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Brown pushes students to think critically about psychological theories. Heavy workload, but you'll come out with a deep understanding of the field.
reviews.subject: Psychology

reviews.review: Avoid if possible. Professor Taylor seems disinterested in teaching and often cancels classes last minute. Assignments are unclear and grading feels arbitrary.
reviews.subject: Sociology

reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen is a coding wizard! His algorithms class is tough but he's always available to help. Projects are practical and great for building your portfolio. Highly recommend for CS majors.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Professor Martinez brings history to life with her storytelling approach. Exams focus on understanding rather than memorization. Her passion for the subject is evident in every lecture.
reviews.subject: History
